page.title: 20CLUBS
page.content: There are many clubs serving the villages in this area, and so only the most popular are mentioned below. {Clubs For Adults:}There are W.I. meetings regularly at Litton and Chewton Mendip. Evergreens, a club for retired people, meets fortnightly at Chewton Mendip. Young Farmer's Club members meet regularly in the area. {Clubs For Children:}There are cub troops nearby at Binegar and Stanton Drew, and scouts are based at Chewton Mendip. Brownies and Guides meet at East Harptree Village Hall. Chewton Mendip School has clubs for children keen on football, rounders, gymnastics, dance, athletics, cricket, orienteering and recorders. The smallest children can attend a Mother's and Toddler's club at Litton and go on to one of the local playgroups at three years of age.{
